# buildkite_user (Data Source)

A data source to reference users by email.

## Example
```hcl
data "buildkite_user" "admin" {
	email = "dev@yourorg.com"
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- **email** (String)

### Read-Only

- **id** (String) The ID of this resource.
- **name** (String)
- **uuid** (String)
